CCustomFilter

Defines an general image filter using a weighted kernel.

Functions
Apply
CRefObj<IImage> CCustomFilter::Apply(
IImage *pImage,
IImage *pMask
)

Defines an image filter for performing median filtering.

Parameters
pImage
IImage*

image to perform filtering on. Must be 32bpp image.

pMask
IImage*

mask specifing where filtering should be performed. Must be a 1bpp image.

Returns

Returns the filtered image.
